name: NFT Moments: Performance ABRIGO (Shelter) 2021 by Andressa Cantergiani
description: This NFT entitles you to a direct intervention at the performance 'Abrigo 2021' (Shelter 2021) by artist Andressa Cantergiani, which will take place on October 21st 2021, at 7 PM (Brasília time) / 00 AM (CET +5h) through the Zoom app. The performance will be presented at the Átrio (Espaço Ceia) of Farol Santander Porto Alegre (Brazil) and streamed via Galeria de Arte Mamute's space at SP-Arte Viewing Room, on October 24th, from 6 PM to 8 PM.
